contents.text:
I want to create a Todo list application.

When I build an application, I only want the minimum functionality required for Todo list.

Since I'm not familiar with programming, please write a requirements analysis report as you see fit.

I want to create a Todo list application.

When I build an application, I only want the minimum functionality required for Todo list.

Since I'm not familiar with programming, please write a requirements analysis report as you see fit.

Make every determinant by yourself, and just show me the analysis report. call analyze function.

reason: The user has requested a Todo list application with minimum functionality and has explicitly asked to proceed with the analysis. Based on this, I will create a comprehensive requirements analysis report that defines the essential features needed for a basic Todo application.

roles.description: The authenticated user who can create, read, update, and delete their own todo items. This role represents the only user type in this minimal application, with full CRUD access to their personal tasks.
roles.name: user
